name: ABC
text:
15 giant tortoises who lived in captivity for decades while in a repopulation program were released into the wild in the Galapagos Islands after the program's success.

Diego, one of the tortoises, is likely 100 years old and has about 800 descendants. https://t.co/ahBp6YZCJd https://t.co/R6E1iz1bpE

name: ABC
text: A college professor been placed on administrative leave following a racist incident where he refused to call a student by her given name and instructed her—twice—to “anglicize” her name. https://t.co/0n8UGUmS9Q

name: ABC
text: “I don’t, honestly,” Sen. Tim Scott says when pressed by @jonkarl on whether he is concerned about Barr firing U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York Geoffrey Berman, who was overseeing an investigation into President Trump’s personal lawyer. https://t.co/LxKnuFaxyu https://t.co/wHfP9VjVt1

name: ABC
text:
“I do wish that Mr. Bolton would have come in to the House under oath and testified,” Sen. Tim Scott tells @jonkarl.

“The problem is that when you’re selling it in a book, you’re not putting yourself in a position to be cross-examined.” https://t.co/RZcFZ15EcR https://t.co/ey9JH9TbzX

name: ABC
text:
Sen. Tim Scott, author of the GOP-backed police reform bill, says that the legislation would leverage federal funding to compel change in local police departments.

If local departments don’t comply with the law, they won’t be eligible for federal funds. https://t.co/gAoIGCWInP https://t.co/Zgt1rT0BZp

name: ABC
text: Sen. Tim Scott says it's “important" to leverage federal resources to "compel" law enforcement "towards the direction that we think is in the best interest of the nation, of the communities that they serve and frankly, of the officers themselves.” https://t.co/gAoIGCWInP https://t.co/z1HWt2ZeAb

name: ABC
text:
A brother and sister had a close call with a large shark that approached them while they snorkeled about 500 feet offshore.

The kids' mother said, while the encounter "rattled them pretty badly," she was sure they'd be "back out there soon." https://t.co/x3Q4kVyJaa https://t.co/kZr0UX8Ojj

name: ABC
text: AG William Barr penned a letter to Geoffrey Berman, who had been serving as the U.S. attorney for the Southern District of New York, informing him that he has formally asked Pres. Donald Trump to remove Berman as U.S. attorney effective immediately. https://t.co/hTaMhVpEwg

name: ABC
text: Rep. Hakeem Jeffries says he hopes former U.S. attorney for SDNY Geoffrey Berman will testify before Congress “because I think he has a lot to say about a continuing pattern of chaos, crisis and corruption that we have seen from the Trump administration.” https://t.co/Lg4ELcdR2D https://t.co/Ya4qPkAXcX

text:

name: ABC
text:
